summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of North 84th Street, from a connection with the existing sewer on Woodland Park Avenue to a point approximately 250-feet west of Aurora Avenue, by constructing sewers, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7485, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
